SEARCH
程序包 si.model

类 Bullet

java.lang.Object
si.model.Bullet
所有已实现的接口:
Hittable, Movable
public class Bullet extends Object implements Movable, Hittable
The Bullet class represents projectiles fired by various entities in the game. Bullets are movable and hittable objects with a defined speed and trajectory.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Bullet

      public Bullet(int x, int y, double angle, String name, double speed)
      Constructor for creating a new Bullet instance.
      参数:
      x - The initial x-coordinate of the bullet.
      y - The initial y-coordinate of the bullet.
      angle - The firing angle of the bullet in degrees.
      name - The name associated with the entity firing the bullet.
      speed - The initial speed of the bullet.
